post.body: oh but the beauty of it. It's all so magical...
My sister and I have a theory.. your memory goes to your kids since they are learning. While your brain cells..well..
you need one of those keychains that are recorders, "leaving my car at albertsons.."
WTF? Someone is going to sake bomb it!! So jealous
your a hater dont judge people that take pictures in there underwear... thats all they got.
that is the cutest donut ever, I want some.. for a second though I did think they were going to be chcken nuggets.
these comments are priceless, I disslike them as much as the new them.. yes I mean nickelback. ::shivers::
aww but his mommy made the nom noms especially for him... :(
Sowy she's taken, no one wants to go w/ me I asked mark and richard once, they avoided it so much they got themselves arrested :(
even better My mom works there.
omg I'm going to have to block you during heroes.. Waiting for the parade next to castle, so purty :) http://snipurl.com/7oq7j
well... Those blue lights are the entrance. Gates don't open until 8. :/ http://snipurl.com/7ojt4
in the middle of the freeway... Or else it's normal. J/k
If it was a male coworker... they get excited everytime they see two "chicks" kissing, it never gets old for them.
I'm sort of confused... hey at least we know that they are still a hot couple. This 2nd disc has some splain' to do.
shhh i'm watching it right now. And it's not about aliens, if you wanted aliens you should have watched Indiana Jones.
it is.. :) I am very happy with it
I'm okay with it really, it means Disney is moving on from there pirate obsession and I am super happy that phase is over. :)
Very nice picture Mr. Mayor.. Welcome to the world of Twitter :D
here is a picture for you http://snipurl.com/7rjyh
Is losing valuable goth points...
one thing I miss about my old place being able to do BP count this vet in :) I gotz skillz!
They sell them everywhere now. I got my nephew the DVD at my local Walmart..
yay!!! So glad it's over.
I'll be having a similar night with hot chocolate and super bad. Staying is quite amazing.
have fun Kat!! So jealous about the adventure ahead. Take lots of pics and send us twitter updates.
because I live here.
Why did I have a feeling you guys were going to go see THATmovie. I've been wanting to see it too.
OH Hush.. If anyone deserves awesome loot it's you. Your awesome and I am happy you are capt of TMR this coming year! :)
*boop*
who cares she already forgot about it... :) She will ask me for it probably in a week.
Because my mom has the best luck finding random bike related things... Why yes it is for barbie. :) http://snipurl.com/73u4m
PB&J doesn't taste so great unless there is J in it. :(
Pomegranate tootsie pop and cloverfield that's what hump day is all about..
ABBA is amazing haters are missing out
Boss knows I have a facebook iknow he's going to friend me soon... :/
why does my boss do that whole cut against the throat motion... its the most annoying thing ever
Enjoying failblog.org 's videos EPIC WIN!!! :D
Planning of Epic Proportion happening... so excited.
save me...
Umm I think I did some serious climbing. talk about being proud of a spoke card :)
Done with the ride oh yay that means it's nom nom time.. Then 30 more??!?
WAR at the beach need nom noms very soon.
Tired need sleep have to wake up early and not hung over tomorrow
At the swapmeet where the fuck are you??
I just made the most offensive yet awesome ringtone YAY me!
I Got the X- Files I want to Believe on DVD today, EXCITED!! I'm going to watch with my teddy bear while I go to sleep.. night night..
motor homes = romantic that is how you can swoon miss johanna.. lolz
Just ran my ass off to catch the bus out of DTLA caught up to him by the following stop. VICTORY!!
Nothing is as frustrating as wanting to make pasta with Alfredo sauce but finding out that my family ate it already :(
WTF my bus fare is going from $3.75 to $4.50 each way!!! I need to move back to LA..
LOLz my sister woke up w/ an unexplained headache, I reminded her of that smirnoff ice she had for dinner.. Her reply "oh, you're right"
It's Xmas craft night and all the activities are sold out except for notepads :( http://snipurl.com/77ezk
Craft night with the kids!! I'm going to make a snowflake and a flower pen pictures later
Seeing a guy with a Bluetooth device on a bmx bike on the streets needs to happen as often as hipster on fixie w/ iPhone.. Oh LA I <3 ...
:( no one wants to go to Disneyland with me....
Finally Home 27 hrs later, I slept on the drive back to Kat's, bike ride home was nice, I'm tired but it was worth it to help the guys.
12 more miles to go... http://snipurl.com/7jev2
Rest stop:6 blankets and warm drinks. http://snipurl.com/7iwku
Mile 139 and it has started sprinkling... Best of luck guys, let's keep going. :)
The last of the famous... http://snipurl.com/7id7l
Sitting in PV listening to rasberry baret waiting for the team. Wearing at least three layers it's freezing up here.
Chasing down Alex and trying to beat him to the next rest stop. I need to sag him back with the rest of the team, he's just so FAST!
For the last 100 miles danny had a "heart" on.. Oh Kat made a funny :) http://snipurl.com/7hm80
La salsa on PCH these dudes can't get enough nom noms! Check out the giant statue Lolz :) http://snipurl.com/7hg72
Doing sag for this crew beats anything else going on this evening, they are amazing and I <3 them. :)
The guys are past the century mark, half way done. PCH not as bad as expected.
This is getting scary and dangerous. Waiting on pch to hopefully regroup some cyclists and ride behind of.
Rest stop 3 right on mullholland, it's getting colder and darker. http://snipurl.com/7gyns
Rest stop 3 eight turn on
Oops forgot the awesome pic http://snipurl.com/7gmtl
Meow this is a lunch break. Miles done 62.4 Go team!!!
Look at them go!!!! Almost there to lunch that is... http://snipurl.com/7g8e1
They're here!! And they need to refuel before the next leg 30 miles and some hillz. http://snipurl.com/7g02q
Waiting at rest stop 1.5 they were too fast for us to set up on rest stop 1 k-9 unit enjoying some noms. http://snipurl.com/7fz5g
Dear twitter, I will be sending updates all day about TMR's Urban Double Century. First a start pic.. http://snipurl.com/7fgva
Before I fall asleep, the best part of the party is also Best picture of the night... http://snipurl.com/7owxi
Ok I'm tired and Ive only been in the park 4 hours. I can haz bedtime. Fun pictures for you http://snipurl.com/7otgb
Yay 10 min line for Indiana Jones! Alien free too :D
Disneyland that's all I can really say http://snipurl.com/7olse
Omg I am the most excited kid here!!!!
At home.. now I have to go and get ready for the Disneyland Christmas party..
All the pizza talk made me want pizza but they are taking too long and I'm hungry.
Watching family favorite, phantom of the paradise..
omg there is a god.. there are mini fruit tarts in my fridge. so yummy!
searching for happy hour in Downtown..
Staying in the city with no bike... I feel naked.. :(
cut off my hair into a bob. Feels nice to have short hair again.. :)
On my way to sierra madre station!! So excited to finally ride at night again.. How I missed it... :)
super busy day at work I hope this means that it's going to fly by... YAY IT"S FRIDAY!
Why is it that now that I'm not looking for my holiday dresses I've found them all? I'm just looking for my rapha jersey, so frustrating :(
I just got the cutest Christmas card... Brought a smile to my face :) http://snipurl.com/7stci
Sporting the Mom hair Bob, because @benhardy has a straightening iron yet he lacks a curling iron.. :)
So when was the last time you heard the phrase "The Bomb!"
I just very nicely complained about my brownie being crap!! Do not approve!
I've decided that I really want creepers for my bday... And yes it is okay for me to think ahead to my bday it's less than a month away.
I've decided that I really want creepers for my birthday... Because I've never had a pair,
Oh noes my interwebz is down at home..
Sort of made me feel old.. But If they are still using the same meal tickets then it's okay http://snipurl.com/8j6gb
Going to my favorite store ever... That's right hot topic :(
Taking care of business...
At store buying festive cupcake decorating goods for my brothers school on Wednesday...
Ps.. my office is lacking electricity, so I sit here cold, wet and in darkness...
Just got in the office, lucky for me there was a break from my ride to union station I wish I would have got the fenders on Sat though. :(
Just got back from seeing The Day the Earth Stood Still... I can say I give it a B- It was entertaining enough :)
Brunch at sports bar how re he'll did this happen to me... :)
Won't be riding this morning but will see everyone at the meeting my legs feel like they are made of jello :(
After riding to and from Pasadena last night I have come to the conclusion that riding fixed is fun but exhausting when hills are involved.
Yay Tonight I will be going RED! Bright Red. It's going to be awesome.. or just like HS!
hmm never seems to get old, fall asleep Dog in his bed, wake up Dog in MY bed... under my bedsheets too... Silly Puppy :D
Just had some of my mom's awesome turkey.. be jealous. ;)
aww I just saw Horton hears a Who... I was crying a river.. So damn cute.
Zomg my nephew only gets the best! http://snipurl.com/93zw9
Why was was I waken up at 5am to wrap presents.... woah slept with make up on again.. look like a scared lonely goth girl..
Merry Christmas Everyone!
My dog is smelling a fire hydrant. Hmm typical.
This is the first time I have been back in the building that I lived 20 years in, someone else is in my living room... So weird. :(
My pup is pimpin it.. @ aunts house :) http://snipurl.com/93fch
Trying to detangle a slinky for my neice. Not very fun :( http://snipurl.com/93aex
My room is full of christmas gifts that my sis and I wrapped last night till 4am. This room is under high security..
My boss was calling me this morning and I know it wasn't to wish me a Merry Christmas...
I'm downloading I love Katamari for my iphone.. I want to see what the fuss is all about..
